rows.label: tlk43420145_02_msg0001
rows.name:
You're saying the leader of the
Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries is dead?

rows.label: tlk43420145_02_msg0002
rows.name: I'm a mercenary, so I knew Vandham.

rows.label: tlk43420145_02_msg0003
rows.name:
When I was a newbie we went out on
a mission to subjugate Ignas together.
He gave me some good advice.

rows.label: tlk43420145_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Like, "Some enemies are immune to Driver
Combos," and "Watch an enemy to find
its weak spot". That kinda thing.

rows.label: tlk43420145_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm a bit reckless, so I'd
just try and kite the enemy.
He put me straight on that.
